channel.title: Front-Paged on Shantanu Vs The World
channel.description: Recent content in Front-Paged on Shantanu Vs The World

item.title: One Month Completed....
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: Today, this blog completes one month of its existence in this world. The achievements, although minuscule in comparison to all the biggies out there, are significant for me. It achieved the following things in just 30 days from the first post: Front-paged at LifeHacker, HacksZine, and many others. Over 10000 (Ten Thousand) “unique” human visitors. Over 30000 (Thirty Thousand) page views by humans. Over 500000 (Half Million) total hits for all website files included.
